channel.title: Lummyscape 562
channel.description:
Hi i'm using the lummyscape 562 hd fullscreen etc and it works fine other than when i compile even if i didnt change anything the compiler shows up clean but then when i try to runserver it gives me an error can somebody please help me
this is what happens when i compile then run the server
Compiling: [code]Compiling LummyScape 562 loading 659 By Lummy Correctly compiled Lummyscape Press any key to continue...[/code]
Now I run the server: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError:com/rs2hd/main : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.ClassLoader.defineClass(Uknown Source)at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Uknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Uknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadclass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)Could not find the mail class: com.rs2hd.Main. Program will exit. Press any key to continue...[/code]
____________________________________________________________________________ The codes to my compiler and run server are.
Compiler: [code]@echo off title LummySCape Compiler Color 3 echo Compiling LummyScape 562 loading 659 By Lummy cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Correctly compiled LummyScape pause[/code]
Run: [code]@echo off title lummyscape 562 loading 659 cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xms250m -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/* com.rs2hd.Main pause[/code]
If somebody could please help me much would be appreciated .

item.title: Lummyscape 562
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“nickyyy, post:4, topic:469114”]First, you have to get JAVA JDK 1.6.27. cause what i hear. is that 562 doesnt support 1.7. so once u have that…

second, change ur class path Variables!
here are mine:
CLASSPATH: .;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin
Path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin

When you are done with that, edit ur compiler.

you want the jdk version to be the one u have ur CLASSPATH and path set to.

[quote]@echo off
title Lummyscape Compiler
Color 81
echo Compiling HuluScape
cd src
cd …
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo Correctly compiled Lummyscape
pause[/quote]
Once you have done that compile your server and run it[/quote]
Nope. That error means that he is trying to run an application with a lower JDK than 1.7.

Read full topic

item.title: Lummyscape 562
item.dc:creator: @nickyyy nickyyy
item.description:
@nickyyy wrote:

First, you have to get JAVA JDK 1.6.27. cause what i hear. is that 562 doesnt support 1.7. so once u have that…

second, change ur class path Variables!
here are mine:
CLASSPATH: .;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin
Path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin

When you are done with that, edit ur compiler.

you want the jdk version to be the one u have ur CLASSPATH and path set to.

@echo off title Lummyscape Compiler Color 81 echo Compiling HuluScape cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Correctly compiled Lummyscape pause
Once you have done that compile your server and run it

Read full topic

item.title: Lummyscape 562
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

Hi i’m using the lummyscape 562 hd fullscreen etc and it works fine other than when i compile even if i didnt change anything the compiler shows up clean but then when i try to runserver it gives me an error can somebody please help me

this is what happens when i compile then run the server

Compiling:

Compiling LummyScape 562 loading 659 By Lummy Correctly compiled Lummyscape Press any key to continue...

Now I run the server:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError:com/rs2hd/main : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.ClassLoader.defineClass(Uknown Source)at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Uknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Uknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadclass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)Could not find the mail class: com.rs2hd.Main. Program will exit. Press any key to continue...

The codes to my compiler and run server are.

Compiler:

@echo off title LummySCape Compiler Color 3 echo Compiling LummyScape 562 loading 659 By Lummy cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Correctly compiled LummyScape pause

Run:

@echo off title lummyscape 562 loading 659 cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xms250m -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/* com.rs2hd.Main pause

If somebody could please help me much would be appreciated .
